data.title: All job opportunities
data.text:
Job description:

Recruiting tomorrow’s Army today. Recruiting Group runs Assessment Centres (AC) for Regular and Reserve Officer and Soldier candidates, which must be passed before applicants are offered a Basic Training place. The Health Technician is a dual role position and as such are required to carry out baseline medical tests in line with accepted policies and procedures. These would usually include (but no be limited to) audiometry, ECG, eyesight testing, colour vision, height and weight measurement, body mass index, urinalysis, and spirometry (lung functions). Additionally, they would be required to carry out administrative tasks such as post pick up, scanning, data input, pre-employment checks and management of health care records. The role is based at Glencorse Assessment Centre. You will required to work 1 Saturday a month which can be claimed back in time off in lieu. You do not need previous medical/clinical experience in order to carry out this role

Job description:

Customer Service Representative Salary: £22,542 per annum Location: Hybrid (Darlington office & home based) Hours: Full time, 37.5 hours per week, Monday – Friday, shift patterns between 8.30am – 6pm Start Date: 14th October 2024 Capita Pensions Solutions are looking for Customer Service Representatives to join our pensions team on a permanent basis. You will work Monday to Friday, with shift patterns between the core hours of 8.30am to 6pm, there’s no evenings or weekends, for a salary of £22,542! If you’re the type of person who loves to help and support people, has call centre and/or customer service experience - this could be the ideal role for you! Our Pensions team deal with incoming calls from a wide range of members and their beneficiaries regarding their pension, you will be part of a specialist and knowledgeable team supporting with various pension enquiries. You will get involved in a wide variety of calls, it’s never a boring day here. *Please note that our offices are based in Darlington and full training (6 – 8 weeks) will take place in Darlington. Following on from your training, the role will be home based with occasional visits to the Darlington office.*

Job description:

How does it sound to earn £25,714.00 from day one with a rapid rise to £27,032.00 once you hit the required competencies? Do you want to work in a bustling & vibrant office environment, with FREE PARKING, access to local transport links, on-site canteen, restaurants & shops, plus a whole host more right on your doorstep? What's more, we also have the opportunity to work from home if you prefer after your qualifying period! (usually around 4-6 months) If so, we want to hear from you! We're looking for empathetic and supportive colleagues to join our existing team servicing a well-known high street banking client based at Tulketh Mill in Preston in September 2024!
